itemDescription: Welsh rugby union and rugby league footballer

wikipedia_page.main: Desmond J. Case was a Welsh rugby union, and professional rugby league footballer who played in the 1930s and 1940s. He played club level rugby union (RU) for Cross Keys RFC and Newport RFC, and representative level rugby league (RL) for Wales, and at club level for Bradford Northern and Castleford (Heritage № 224 as a wartime guest), as a wing, or centre, i.e. number 2 or 5, or 3 or 4. Case was a Sergeant Major in the British Army during World War II.
